message_1: What is the minimum number of crossings required to turn a Trefoil knot (a specific type of knot) into its mirror image?
message_2: To turn a trefoil knot into its mirror image, you need to change the handedness of the knot. The minimum number of crossings required to achieve this is 1. By changing the over/under pattern at one crossing, you can convert the trefoil knot into its mirror image.
